snippet.title: The Grinch: Christmas Adventures | Announce Trailer | US | ESRB
snippet.description: You know how much I love Christmas 😒. Anyway, I'm here to announce that The Grinch: Christmas Adventures video game 🎮 will be out October 13. See you in Who-ville! I'll be there for the presents 🎁😏 #TheGrinch #TheGrinchChristmasAdventures
